body: They didnt have to do that guy dirty like that, i mean they are all sluts that only like dick no mixed feelings but still

Can we take just a moment of silence for the poor guy that is in that place, loaded where literally everyone is getting laid except for him? I mean, sure, he gets some fun but they deny him the best bits...
Regarding the author's note: No Shiwasu no Okina, we did NOT like that OVA! It made those cheapo Queen Bee adaptations look good.
This needs to get rid of the censure.
